sentences.sContent: We’ve kept the original features of the house as far as possible (= as much as possible ) .
sentences.sCn: 我们尽量保留了房子的原貌。

sentences.sContent: How far do those old, outdated laws affect today’s legislation?
sentences.sCn: 那些陈旧过时的法律对今天的立法有多少影响？

sentences.sContent: His style was far removed (= very different ) from that of Picasso.
sentences.sCn: 他的风格与毕加索有天壤之别。

synos.tran: 很；遥远地；久远地；到很远的距离；到很深的程度

trans.tranCn: 很；遥远地；久远地；到很远的距离；到很深的程度
trans.tranOther: very much, or to a great degree
